game.name: Millennium 2 - Take Me Higher
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Can Marine, Benoit, Karine and her friends find 12 warriors to confront the 13 dreaded Lords of Mystrock? Will Jeanne the magical fairy still support them and unleash her devastating spells on the foes? Play Millennium 2, live the tale and find out!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Can Marine, Benoit, Karine and her friends find 12 warriors to confront the 13 dreaded Lords of Mystrock? Will Jeanne the magical fairy still support them and unleash her devastating spells on the foes? Play Millennium 2, live the tale and find out!
